name: BaySide Wheels Burnout ! Monster Truck Driving & Blitz Racing
name_original: BaySide Wheels Burnout ! Monster Truck Driving & Blitz Racing
description:
Sit on Driving Seat of fully upgraded truck for racing with experts drivers, lets see who can drift the heavy trucks in best way, speed you monsters and show some drifting on sharp turns.

As world Top drivers participating in this championship of sea side track you should show your skills and burnout your wheels.
